methods.name: Azerite for the Alliance
methods.description: Assist the Alliance by collecting Azerite on Island Expeditions.

methods.name: World Quests
methods.description: Complete 7th Legion world quests in Kul Tiras.

methods.name: War Campaign
methods.description: Complete the War Campaign quests in Kul Tiras.

methods.name: Garrison Missions
methods.description: Complete available Garrison missions that reward 7th Legion reputation.

methods.name: Artisan's Consortium Contract
methods.description: Complete world quests whilst under the effect of a Artisan's Consortium contract. (Lasts 7 days)
